question: RESPONSIVIST Class of Leaders belonged to?
explanation: In the year 1923, the Swaraj party was formed. After the death of C.R. Das, internal bifurcation took place based on ideology i.e., Responsivists and Non-responsivists. Lala Lajpat Rai, N C Kelkar, Madan Mohan Maviya were the responsivists, who had the intension of cooperation with the Government and in 1926, non-responsivists like Motilal Nehru, withdrew from legislatures.
